circus.translation[0].definitions[0].def: a group of people and animals who travel to different places performing skilful tricks as entertainment
circus.translation[0].definitions[0].not: circus ring (=a large circular area where tricks are performed)
circus.translation[0].definitions[1].def: a situation in which there is too much excitement or noise

circus.translation[0].definitions[2].def: a round open area where several streets join together, often used in place names
